changeSet.createView: select distinct USER_NAME, APPLICATION_NAME, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_ID, SCOPE_ID from ( select u.USER_NAME, a.NAME as APPLICATION_NAME, r.NAME as ROLE_NAME, r.ROLE_ID, ur.SCOPE_ID from USER_T u, USER_ROLE_T ur, ROLE_T r, APPLICATION_T a where r.APPLICATION_ID=a.APPLICATION_ID and ur.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID and ur.USER_ID=u.USER_ID and ur.SCOPE_ID is null and r.STATUS='E' and (u.STATUS='E' or (u.STATUS='L' and u.LOCKOUT_TO<=NOW())) and coalesce(u.ACTIVE_FROM, NOW())<= NOW() and coalesce(u.ACTIVE_TO, NOW())>= NOW() union select u.USER_NAME, a.NAME as APPLICATION_NAME, r.NAME as ROLE_NAME, r.ROLE_ID, ur.SCOPE_ID from USER_T u, USER_ROLE_T ur, ROLE_T r, SCOPE_T s, APPLICATION_T a where r.APPLICATION_ID=a.APPLICATION_ID and ur.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID and ur.USER_ID=u.USER_ID and ur.SCOPE_ID=s.SCOPE_ID and r.STATUS='E' and (u.STATUS='E' or (u.STATUS='L' and u.LOCKOUT_TO<=NOW())) and s.STATUS='E' and coalesce(u.ACTIVE_FROM, NOW())<= NOW() and coalesce(u.ACTIVE_TO, NOW())>= NOW() and coalesce(s.ACTIVE_FROM, NOW())<= NOW() and coalesce(s.ACTIVE_TO, NOW())>= NOW() ) foo
